event.title: lies at the heart of the Edinburgh & South East Scotland City region with a population in 2014

data.event: Edinburgh lies at the heart of the Edinburgh & South East Scotland City region with a population in 2014 of 1,339,380.
The University of Edinburgh, founded in 1582 and now one of four in the city, was placed 17th in the QS World University Rankings in 2013 and 2014.

event.title: now one of four in the city, was placed
